name: school-admin-vue-node
description: A full school administration project with four types of logins (school admin, school teacher, students, parents) using the MEVN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, Vue.js, Node.js) is a comprehensive task, but I can provide you with a high-level outline to get you started. Keep in mind that this is a simplified version, and you can expand and customize it based on your specific requirements.

scripts.start: (cd server && yarn dev;) & (cd frontend && yarn dev)

author: Boni Gope
